the bundle suffered an unfortunate combat injury and should be returning to battle shortly
do we have an ETA on those reinforcements?
yes captain! sorry for the wait! the trainee bundle has been sent to the skins tab under "chromas" until we are able to return it to the featured section.
Dude Fal, you are captain. You command Rito. Tell them you want Pool Party Ahri and send it my way
The post says 15% Off, but the maths is only 11% Off? Is that intentional?
do you already own Teemo? it's 15% off with the champion so can change depending on which pieces of the bundle you already have. sorry for the confusion!

Agreed this event is a waste of time...
I mean you don't have to do anything just play the game as usual lol.
As a Soraka opt I dont usually have to KS Draven....

I mean.. If you don't care about the icon, don't ruin it for the few of us who enjoy the little things like icons. like, legit, if you cant appreciate the work that Riot artists put into providing a variety of icons for us to use. I love my ahri and nami icons, I loved the last events icons. The santabaron Icon is adorable. If you got a problem with icons don't bother looking at them. I personally change my icon like every week. The more the merrier!
